mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memberno, name, sex, age, id, password, nickname, tel, address1, address2, email, rdate) VALUES (member_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{tel}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{email}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member ORDER BY memberno ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member CASCADE WHERE memberno=#{memberno}
